attributes.action: Prosecute headteachers who suspend pupils based on their clothing or appearance.
attributes.additional_details: Schools on the Continent do not waste time, money and resources by trying to force pupils to conform unless it is a private or religious school - they simply get on with teaching the essentials. Heads in the UK purport to promote equality and discipline, yet they undermine the very values they swear to uphold with this uniform obsession and it must end. Uniforms must be abolished for good - the heads' justifications and arguments hold no water from an objective and logical perspective.
attributes.background: For far too long, headteachers have acted extremely unprofessionally by suspending, punishing and even expelling pupils who do not conform to the schools' draconian uniform codes, subverting their right to an education. This is deliberate discrimination and abuse of power.

rejection.details:
A school's behaviour policy - including deciding on punishments for particular behaviour - is the responsibility of the headteacher. You can find out more about this here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/488034/Behaviour_and_Discipline_in_Schools_-_A_guide_for_headteachers_and_School_Staff.pdf

If you want the UK Government to abolish uniform in all schools, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/215908
